snippet.title: Stitchy in Tooki Trouble I Launch Trailer (Nintendo Switch)
snippet.description:
🌽 Out now on Nintendo Switch, with 25% launch discount! 🌽

Save your corn and defeat troublesome thieving Tooki! Stitchy is easy to pick up and play, at home or on the go! A charming art style plus inventive enemies and intuitive controls make this an all ages platforming delight! 

Buy now for a 25% launch discount – available until April 18 on Nintendo Switch Europe and Japan, or until April 30 on Nintendo Switch North America!

🛒Nintendo eShop🛒
EU: https://www.nintendo.co.uk/Games/Nintendo-Switch-download-software/Stitchy-in-Tooki-Trouble-1948153.html
America: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/stitchy-in-tooki-trouble-switch
Japan: https://store-jp.nintendo.com/list/software/70010000038813.html

🐐 About Polygoat 🐐
Polygoat is an independent game studio founded in 2017 and located in rustic Peer, Belgium. Besides developing our inhouse projects, we also work with clients. 
Polygoat stands for quality and workmanship, with a unique graphic style and high fun factor.

💻 Find us here 💻

General website: https://www.polygoat.com


Stitchy website: https://www.tookitrouble.com
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/Polygoat
Twitter: https://twitter.com/polygoatstudio
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/polygoatstudio
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/polygoatstudio

#StitchyinTookiTrouble #NintendoSwitch #Platformer
